articles.author: Sanjay Mishra
articles.title: What causes long COVID? The answer might be in your gut - National Geographic
articles.description: New research shows that remnants of the virus in the gut cause chronic inflammation—which may disrupt communication with the brain. Can antidepressants help?
articles.content: Nearly one in five people who have had COVID-19 in the United States continue to suffer from symptoms of long COVID. But why some people recover completely while others remain sick has been a mystery… [+7487 chars]
